payload.message:
Generate morning market briefing in German and send to WhatsApp group using Docker:

1. Build/run Docker: cd /home/art/niemand/skills/finance-news && docker run --rm finance-news-briefing python3 scripts/briefing.py --time morning --lang de 2>&1 | tail -60 > /tmp/morning_briefing.txt

2. Read /tmp/morning_briefing.txt and send contents to WhatsApp group 120363421796203667@g.us using message tool

If Docker fails, report the error.

Generate evening market briefing in German and send to WhatsApp group using Docker:

1. Build/run Docker: cd /home/art/niemand/skills/finance-news && docker run --rm finance-news-briefing python3 scripts/briefing.py --time evening --lang de 2>&1 | tail -60 > /tmp/evening_briefing.txt

2. Read /tmp/evening_briefing.txt and send contents to WhatsApp group 120363421796203667@g.us using message tool

If Docker fails, report the error.
